title: Fauci says the omicron variant will inevitably appear in the U.S.
content:
1. Fauci says the omicron variant will inevitably appear in the U.S.  NPR
  2. Full Fauci Interview: 'We Really Need To Be Prepared' For Omicron Covid Transmission  NBC News
  3. Fauci says 'troublesome' omicron 'might evade immune protection' | TheHill  The Hill
  4. NIH Director: Omicron 'particularly contagious,' severity remains unknown  Fox News
  5. Fauci explains what is 'troublesome' about Omicron variant  New York Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: Fauci氏によると、オミクロン・バリアントは必然的に米国でも登場するという。
